title: Gryphon House
description: "Don't go out tomorrow, child, it will be Saturday and we are burying one of our own." Amelia looked out and saw two young men digging a grave in the patch of grass by the jagged cliff. On a cursed island...Gryphon House holds a shameful secret...  Other stories in this collection, The Washer Woman and Time Cheat.
author: Ashley Fogg
